title: Caster, ca. 1800–30
provenance: Delomosne and Son, LTD. (4-22-64) purchased by WPW.
description: "Urn with cover" shape on square star out base. Flat fluted skin and foot with rug knop. All over diamond cut pattern with prismatic rings. Upturned rim with fan flutesssl Baluster "Finial" with pierced, radial cutbutton top pierced with holes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Caster, ca. 1800–30.
ca. 1800–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-162.
